mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Fairfax militia recruited from the church during the Revolutionary War… During the American Civil War the church was used by Union troops as a hospital and later as a stable. …The church was remodeled in 1908 and extensively renovated in 1959. Galleries in Wren's original design but never constructed were installed, and a new chancel was added. Other than repairs of war damage and the chancel addition, the structure reflects the original 1769 construction. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Falls_Church [work]
